localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Bakstage is a fun casual space for people to interact with real people via audio conversations. You can join conversations about topics like movies, shows, sports, news, finance, etc. Bakstage brings fans, personalities, brands, influencers into one space.
nodes.title: Bakstage - A fun casual space for people to interact via audio
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Postmodern is the app for anonymous, short, ephemeral one-on-one conversations. Explore the void.
nodes.title: Postmodern. - Anonymous, short, ephemeral conversations with others
nodes.author: Nathaniel

nodes.excerpt: PodRoom provides podcasters with the platform needed to connect with like-minded individuals, raise awareness for their self-owned media outlet, and ultimately, command a greater share of ad revenue in the digital realm.
nodes.title: PodRoom - Podcast social networking platform
nodes.author: Tolu Akintunde

nodes.excerpt: Something better than "like a local". No tours, no guides, no crowds, no spam, no COVID-19. A special travel app for sharing off the beaten, hardcore and mostly free places to visit with like-minded people.
nodes.title: FREEKIN' - Social network and marketplace for non-touristy places
nodes.author: Ekaterina Lysykh

nodes.excerpt: bMoves is the geo-localized solution to manage your field activities. Available on the field and in the office, bMoves enables you to document, visualize and export everything you do.
nodes.title: bMoves - The smart way to manage your field activities
nodes.author: Thibaut Bongard

nodes.excerpt: Create beautiful and inspiring videos for your business. Write-on Video's rich features allow you to simplify your video production from start to finish. Once your video content is ready, share it on social media or export the project as a PDF storyboard.
nodes.title: Write-on Video for Android - Make video outlines, create storyboards, easily edit clips
nodes.author: Vlad Shvets

nodes.excerpt: Get notified for downtime! Set up, manage, & stay notified everywhere you go! Never miss a downtime or SSL problem again thanks to push and SMS notifications. Try the fully revamped mobile app for UptimeRobot: The world's leading uptime monitoring service.
nodes.title: UptimeRobot App 2.0 - Web, SSL, ports & Cron-jobs monitoring

nodes.title: Travlee - Plan journeys, plant trees, offset emissions

nodes.excerpt: Protect and optimize your health â€“ long before warning signs appear! Find out your Health Index score and get true-to-you recommendations to improve your health for good. Then, watch your Health Index improve over time!
nodes.title: Vilua+ - Itâ€™s your health, take control
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Audiotorium is a free live audio app for location-based performances. Rediscover your neighborhood with this location-aware app and bring those block parties to life. Record stage performances in a new way and replay them as live with a new set of audiences.
nodes.title: Audiotorium - Hyper-local live audio performances
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: UpNote is an elegant and powerful note-taking app that works across Android, Mac, Windows and iOS. Designed to make it easy to take notes and stay focused, UpNote combines a beautiful interface with a fluid workflow for a refined note-taking experience.
nodes.title: UpNote for Android - Simple, beautiful note-taking app across platforms
nodes.author: Thomas

nodes.excerpt: Emolog is easy to use! Select your emoji to sum up your day and record it, simple as that! You can fill in your diary as much as you want! If you donâ€™t feel like it, just leave a title. You can also record your precious emotions within just a few seconds!
nodes.title: Emolog - Record your daily emotions using emojis
nodes.author: Robin

nodes.excerpt: Brig Note is your personal note-taking tool, combines recording and typing in an effective way. It gives you the possibility to record your voice during your lecture or any other kind of speech or event and taking notes over recording.
nodes.title: Brig Note - Take notes over voice recordings
nodes.author: Jim Raptis

nodes.excerpt: Citonhub is an all-in-one platform for developers to mentor, grow a community, and earn.
nodes.title: Citonhub - All-in-one platform for devs to mentor & grow a community
nodes.author: Tola Owolabi

nodes.excerpt: Track working hours and save more time for what's crucial for your business' success. Unlimited users, projects, and tasks, 100% free forever.
nodes.title: TimeCamp - New free time tracking plan for unlimited users â±ï¸
nodes.author: Ola Rybacka

nodes.excerpt: Angle Audio is a free cross-platform social audio app for authentic group conversations. Join existing topics or start one yourself and enjoy features such as screen-sharing, text-chat and live-celebrations to connect with other users in audio conversations.
nodes.title: Angle Audio - Social audio group conversations for iOS, Android and web
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: YESIM is the most functional eSIM application in the world. Having only eSIM compatible device and YESIM App, you get an opportunity to connect mobile internet in 126+ countries in the world, without paying roaming fees or changing sim-cards.
nodes.title: Yesim - International eSIM application
nodes.author: Dmitri Verbovski

nodes.excerpt: Test Lottie animations for mobile from the LottieFiles website, After Effects, or Adobe Animate plugins. Easily send animations as Lottie, GIF, or MP4 to your stakeholders. Access 1000s of Lottie animations anytime, anywhere, while on the go. And much more!
nodes.title: LottieFiles Mobile App - Test, discover, and share Lottie animations faster
nodes.author: Nattu

nodes.excerpt: View every product, get attracted to the product, if you like it we will take you to the Product Hunt page and you can see complete detailed info. about the product. With Daku, you can discover all new apps, games books, and podcasts on a daily basis
nodes.title: Daku - It's like Tinder for Product Hunt
nodes.author: Subhendu

nodes.excerpt: Insert any preferences you have such as streaming services, genres, keywords, actors, release years, age filters, runtime; and Movie of the Night will instantly find the best shows for you to start watching right away instead of browsing catalogs for hours.
nodes.title: Movie of the Night - Instantly find something to watch on your streaming services
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Breathly is a 100% free mobile app that helps you focus on your breathing. Use Breathly for daily relaxation and breath training: just choose a breathing technique and focus on the guided exercise. Breathly is free, with no trackers and no in-app purchases.
nodes.title: Breathly - Open-source breath training and relaxation app
nodes.author: Matteo Mazzarolo

nodes.excerpt: RewardMe is a new way of reward program that helps you earn rewards automatically at your favourite merchants. By simply binding your email accounts or credit cards, you will automatically get rewarded on eligible purchases in cryptocurrency or reward dollars.
nodes.title: RewardMe - Up to 10% cashback in crypto for food, ride and e-commerce
nodes.author: Heatherm Huang

nodes.excerpt: Language learning is hard... so we made it soft. It's time to turn your bathroom into a classroom with our latest innovation: toilet paper that teaches you phrases in new languages! Never miss a lesson again, because nature is the best push notification.
nodes.title: Duolingo Roll - Turn your bathroom into a classroom
nodes.author: Jack Morgan

nodes.excerpt: Salut is a creator platform for fitness pros. We make it fun and easy for fitness creators to build and monetize a community. Schedule, stream, socialize, and monetize virtual fitness content - all in one app for free.
nodes.title: Salut - The creator platform for fitness
nodes.author: Justin Mitchell
